title.narrative: OUTPUT 7.5: CROSS-SECTORAL

description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Operations Support To Programme Delivery (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2024, the country programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: New Element

description.narrative: A functional risk management to support programme implementation and delivery of life-saving interventions. Strengthened Institutional capacity building of government and partners for vaccines management with support from donors and stakeholders. The office embarked on strategic engagement with government and partners to accelerate results for children. Promotion of greening initiatives through a deliberate and systematic approach to switch from fossil fuel to renewable energy. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:05/01/2022
